00046 ObjectiveFunctionTemplate::~ObjectiveFunctionTemplate() {}
00047 
00048 void ObjectiveFunctionTemplate::initialize_queue( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00049                                                   const Settings* settings,
00050                                                   MsqError& err )
00051 {
00052   qualityMetric->initialize_queue( mesh_and_domain, settings, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00053 }
00054 
00055 bool ObjectiveFunctionTemplate::initialize_block_coordinate_descent( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00056                                                       const Settings* settings,
00057                                                       PatchSet* ,
00058                                                       MsqError& err )
00059 {
00060   std::auto_ptr<PatchSet> patch_set;
00061   switch (get_quality_metric()->get_metric_type())
00062   {
00063     case QualityMetric::VERTEX_BASED:  
00064       patch_set = std::auto_ptr<PatchSet>(new VertexPatches( 1, false ));
00065       break;
00066     case QualityMetric::ELEMENT_BASED: 
00067       patch_set = std::auto_ptr<PatchSet>(new ElementPatches);
00068       break;
00069     default: 
00070       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Cannot initialize for BCD for unknown metric type", 
00071                       MsqError::INVALID_STATE);
00072       return false;
00073   }
00074 
00075   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00076   MeshDomain* domain = mesh_and_domain->get_domain();
00077 
00078   clear();
00079   patch_set->set_mesh( mesh );
00080   PatchIterator patches( patch_set.get() );
00081   
00082   PatchData pd;
00083   pd.set_mesh( mesh );
00084   pd.set_domain( domain );
00085   if (settings)
00086     pd.attach_settings( settings );
00087   
00088   bool result = true;
00089   while (patches.get_next_patch( pd, err ) && !MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00090   {
00091     double value;
00092     bool b = evaluate( ObjectiveFunction::ACCUMULATE, pd, value, false, err ); 
00093     MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00094     result = result && b;
00095   }
00096   return result;
00097 }
00098 
00099 int ObjectiveFunctionTemplate::min_patch_layers() const
00100 {
00101   if (!get_quality_metric())
00102     return 0;
00103   else if (get_quality_metric()->get_metric_type() == QualityMetric::VERTEX_BASED)
00104     return 2;
00105   else
00106     return 1;
00107 }
